item.description:
Meet and Shop with Five Talented Brookline Jewelry Artists
Jenn Mason, mixed-media artist and author
Michelle Rothman, of Ojas Jewelry Design
Hanne Bernstein of Danish Jewelry Design
Sara Harding of Sara Danielle Designs
Lisa Trachtman of Abeille

Jenn Mason will be signing and demonstrating key techniques from her latest book, Altered Paper Jewelry. Sara, Michelle, Hanne and Lisa will be showing their work and are available to answer questions, providing a great opportunity to learn more, support local art and get a head start on your holiday shopping. Participants in the events will be entered into a drawing to win free jewelry. Wine and cheese for all so come and celebrate!


If you can’t make it to Thursday’s celebration, come join us for a “Girls Night” Workshop on Friday from 6pm-7:30pm. We are offering this workshop at a discounted rate of $10. Wine and refreshments will be served, of course.

To learn more about the artists or the event, check our our blog or follow us Twitter for additional details about the event. We hope to see you there!

Lisa

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: FREE: Meet the Jewerly Artist, Trunk Show, Book Signing, Tips and Techniques
